document.full_text: greece faced a new surge in its debt costs on thursday after germany said for the first time that athens may need to restructure its debt, a move one central banker warned would be a "catastrophe."
document.title: euro zone hit by greek restructuring worry
lines_and_colors: greece faced a new surge in its debt costs on thursday after germany said for the first time that athens may need to restructure its debt, a move one central banker warned would be a "catastrophe."
